title: Loomis' Fuss Sees Quarter Point Rate Hike in December (Audio)
itunes:title: Loomis' Fuss Sees Quarter Point Rate Hike in December (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Dan Fuss, Vice Chairman of Loomis Sayles, on the markets and outlook for bonds and the Fed.
